titles.title: To authorize the award of the Medal of Honor to James C. McCloughan for acts of valor during the Vietnam War.
To authorize the award of the Medal of Honor to James C. McCloughan for acts of valor during the Vietnam War.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: This bill authorizes the President to award the Medal of Honor to James C. McCloughan for acts of valor during the Vietnam War for which he was previously awarded the Bronze Star Medal with "V" Device.
